item.title: D latch
item.description: S = 1, R = 0: Set S = 0, R = 0: Hold S = 0, R = 1: Reset S = 1, R = 1: Not allowed $$ \begin{aligned} \sum_{n=1}^{\infty} a_n z^n &= \sum_{n=1}^{\infty} a_n z^n\\ &= \sum_{k=0}^{\infty} c_k (x-a)^k .
